name: Veil Token
description: Veil Cash is a privacy application leveraging zk-SNARKs on Base L2, enabling verified depositors to achieve privacy and anonymity within a pool of trusted users. Veil Cash is a non-custodial privacy protocol on Base L2. Veil Cash's goal will be enabling verified users to achieve privacy and anonymity from trusted pools. Veil is a set of smart contracts that will allow users that are deemed as verified users to deposit into the protocol. Users can later withdraw their deposits from another address without creating a link between these two addresses. Verified users are those who meet certain criteria based on both on-chain and off-chain data.
